verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] methodically remaking government policy on reproductive health — moving to limit access to birth control and abortion and bolstering abstinence - only sex education .

[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [ARGM-MNR: methodically] [V: remaking] [ARG1: government policy on reproductive health] — [ARGM-PRD: moving to limit access to birth control and abortion and bolstering abstinence - only sex education] .
